body_content.explanation: not moving or not able to move:
examples: We were sitting in non-moving traffic for twenty minutes.
The camera lens seemed to work better when shooting a nonmoving subject.

body_content.explanation: relating to a vehicle that is parked or not being driven:
examples: He was fined for a nonmoving violation because his car had improper seat belts.

body_content.explanation: relating to the side of a court case that did not ask for the case to be brought:
examples: Cases of doubt or ambiguity are viewed by the court in the way most favorable to the non-moving party.
